Module jGame
Package jGame.core.entity.component

Class MovementComponent

java.lang.Object
jGame.core.entity.component.Component
jGame.core.entity.component.MovementComponent
public class MovementComponent
extends Component
The default implementation of a movement component.
Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira

    • setMovementKeyControl

      public void setMovementKeyControl​(int newKey, int keyControl) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Assigns a new key binding to the specified control.
      Parameters:
      newKey - the new key binded to the control
      keyControl - the control of the specified key
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified keyControl isn't in range
      Since:
      2.0.0
      See Also:
      KeyEvent

    • setKeyBinding

      public void setKeyBinding​(int keyBinding, MovementComponent.MovementAction onAction, MovementComponent.MovementAction offAction) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Sets a key binding for a specific action. An 'offAction' parameter must be also passed in to be activated when the key stops being pressed.
      Parameters:
      keyBinding - the keyCode of the key that triggers this action
      onAction - the action to perform when the key is pressed
      offAction - the action to perform when the key is no longer pressed
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if we try to bind an action to a movement key
      Since:
      2.0.0
